chapters.title: Chapter 21:  Within the Stone
chapters.info: Lady Caraline Damodred, p. 454—Cairhienin noble who made claim to the Sun Throne in Cairhien; she is related to Laman, the last king from House Damodred. She was in league with High Lord Darlin of Tear and Toram Riatin of Cairhien in opposition to Rand. They have since reconciled their differences. Min had a viewing that she and Darlin would marry, but only after she led him on a “merry chase.” See also Riatin, Toram; Sisnera, Darlin.
